channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Ginny Buckley presents an arresting range of houses to a couple who have a substantial budget of ?700,000 and are hoping to relocate their family to the wonderful Norfolk countryside. For over half a century, Norfolk has also been home to Lotus cars, so whilst in the county Ginny finds out more about the company heritage before catching a glimpse of the future when their latest hypercar is unveiled.
